scripts.build: next build --webpack && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && cp -r .open-next/assets/_next .open-next/ && cp -r .open-next/assets/* .open-next/ 2>/dev/null || : && rm -rf .open-next/assets && mv .open-next/worker.js .open-next/_worker.js && cp _routes.json .open-next/
scripts.build:worker: next build --webpack && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && cp -r .open-next/assets/_next .open-next/ && cp -r .open-next/assets/* .open-next/ 2>/dev/null || : && rm -rf .open-next/assets && mv .open-next/worker.js .open-next/_worker.js && cp _routes.json .open-next/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler deploy
